description: Dia Zerva makes her debut on Public Disgrace in a totally explosive update you won't want to miss. She starts off trapped in a cage that is suspended in the air while party guests poke and prod at her naked flesh. She is asked to pee, and when she doesn't comply she is cattleproded for every thirty seconds she makes the audience wait. Then she is put in restrictive bondage, blindfolded and offered up to the crowd who use all her holes for their enjoyment!!!
title: Dia Zerva live at the Armory!
